SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class RMIConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Connection
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.RMIConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class RMIConnection extends Connection
This class represents the connection between the server and the client. It extends the Connection class and is used by the RMI server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RMIConnection(Server server, RMIClientHandler client, RMIServer serverHandler, Integer id)
    This constructor creates a connection with the server, the client handler, the server handler and the id.

      This constructor creates a connection with the server, the client handler, the server handler and the id.
      Parameters:
      server - is the server of the connection.
      client - is the client handler of the connection.
      serverHandler - is the server handler of the connection.
      id - is the id of the connection.
